name: NovaKit CLI
description: A free and open-source AI coding agent that lives in your terminal. Features multi-provider LLM support (GPT-5, Claude, GitHub Copilot, Gemini), instant rewind with checkpoints, LSP integration for code intelligence, semantic code search, and three modes (Agent, Review, Plan). Designed as a CLI-first alternative to Cursor and Claude Code.
community_quotes: Reached #8 Product of the Day on Product Hunt
Free forever with no subscription - use your own API keys or get bundled access
Multi-provider support means no vendor lock-in
Esc+Esc for instant rewind is a game-changer for AI-assisted coding
LSP integration gives proper IDE-level code intelligence in the terminal
